title: To people that cry about Yasuo.

replies.body: I'll just ban him, he is annoying and I'd just rather not deal with him being in the game regardless of team.
What are your arguments for him not being annoying, except for playing his counters?

They main Yasuo.

That is probably their only argument.
Just destroyed a level 7 yasuo main playing support. You can check my match history it was the really good draven game.
